original_title: 痴漢電車　挑発する淫ら尻
overview: Yuji, who has never had a girlfriend, molests Erika, an office worker, on a crowded train. Passengers on the spirit world train waiting for their turn to go to the other world are presented with the condition that they can avoid going to hell if they can make Yuji lose his virginity within a month. The ghosts desperately try to make Yuji and Erika's love come true, but... This is an ingenious original molester story. The genius director Naoyuki Tomomatsu presents in a unique way the story of love and lust between a perverted man and a beautiful office worker. Fresh idol actresses such as Akika Kitagawa, Emi Kitagawa, and Lemon Hanazawa co-star gorgeously. The unique personalities of the ghostly co-stars are also worth seeing.
title: Molester Train Provocative Nasty Ass
